summary: AN ORDINANCE revising the 1996 annual budget by decreasing certain expenditure allowances and increasing certain other expenditure allowance in the 1996 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various City funds; to provide for various costs and expenses not provided for in the 1996 Budget by appropriation, reappropriation, and transfer from various City funds including the Emergency Subfund, and declaring the Emergency therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
